name: Baldur's Gate III
description: Baldur's Gate 3 is a story-rich, party-based RPG set in the universe of Dungeons & Dragons, where your choices shape a tale of fellowship and betrayal, survival and sacrifice, and the lure of absolute power.

dlcs.name: Baldur's Gate III: Digital Deluxe Edition
dlcs.description: For those looking to get a little more out of Baldur’s Gate 3, the Digital Deluxe Edition upgrade content includes in-game cosmetics, such as a unique custom dice skin to show off to your friends, as well as practical in-game items such as the Mask of the Shapeshifter from Divinity: Original Sin 2. Listen to the magical music of Borislav Slavov’s Original Soundtrack for Baldur’s Gate 3 or even pick up a pen and play D&D as one of our Origin characters with the handy printable pre-made character sheets. There’s plenty to get stuck into, in and outside of the game.

dlcs.name: Baldur's Gate III: Toolkit Data
dlcs.description:
Unlock the official Baldur's Gate 3 Toolkit and reshape the world of Faerûn. This powerful modding engine lets you: 
- Create and publish your own mods to share with the community.
- Develop new character classes and subclasses.
- Design custom spells and magical abilities.
- Personalize dice skins for unique gameplay flair.
- Add original weapons and armor to expand your arsenal.
- Make scripting changes using Osiris, the game's scripting language, to define custom behaviors and events.
And much more—bring your creative vision to life in Baldur's Gate 3!
